stripped_text: When an agenda is scored or stolen from this server or its root, trash this ice. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 3 credits. Subroutine End the run if the Runner is tagged.
text:
When an agenda is scored or stolen from this server or its root, trash this ice.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
title: Lamplighter
